thawath ginum dekak sambandhawa aththe suba්ramaniyam surendran nam pudgalayekuge namataya.thaman kolambaa wyaparika kawayange samajikayeku lesa hadunwadi athi ohu sathuwa lanka widuli bala mandalaye kotasda athi bawa sadahanya.ek ginumaka thanpath kara athi mudale watinakama dolar 6la564la952 ki.anek ginuma ohuge aththe ohuge birida bawa kiyana charlat ranjitha nam kanthawakage namini.wruththiya lesa gruhaniyak yayi sadahan wana ayage ginume watinakama dolar 6,495,287 ki.thaman eejanthawarayeku lesa raukiyawa karana bawa suba්ramaniyam sadahan kara atha.atham awasthawan waladi ohu bankuwa ha ganudenu kara aththe ohu wenuwata awasaralath madihathkaruweku yodaganimini.

elesa sahena durak gamankala pasuwa apata idiriyen dakinnata labune bas rathaya gaman ganna margayaki.eya dutu wigasa mage mithura ma ethek asa thibunu siyaluma parusha wachanawalata amatharawa ohuge nawa nirmana walinuth nopakilawa mata sangraha karannata yeduni.pradhana margaya osseth tharamak dura pamini pasu apata sanwali wiharaya idiriyata paminimata haki wuwath ee asala pokunak pawathiya haki lakunakwath daka ganimata nothibini .kesewethath kanda paththata thibunu adiparak wiyaligiya mana panduru athara dakinnata thibunu nisa api ee osse gaman karathma pihiti gale sadi thibunu pokuna asa gatuni.wiyali kalaya nisa ehi wathura adiyatama sindi thibuni .ee asala saruwata akkapana wadi thibunu athara mama palamuwarata akkapana mal dutuwe ehidi yi.
